docs.text: Class: ChromosomeLocation A Location on a chromosome defined by a species and chromosome name. URI: GA4GHVRSDefinitions:ChromosomeLocation Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info _id CURIE 0..1 Location Id. MUST be unique within document. . type NONE 1..1 MUST be "ChromosomeLocation" . species_id CURIE 1..1 CURIE representing a species from the NCBI species taxonomy . Default: "taxonomy:9606" (human) . chr NONE 1..1 The symbolic chromosome name. For humans, For humans, chromosome names MUST be one of 1..22, X, Y (case-sensitive) . interval CytobandInterval 1..1 The chromosome region defined by a CytobandInterval . docs.text: Class: DerivedSequenceExpression An approximate expression of a sequence that is derived from a referenced sequence location. Use of this class indicates that the derived sequence is approximately equivalent to the reference indicated, and is typically used for describing large regions in contexts where the use of an approximate sequence is inconsequential. docs.text: Class: SequenceInterval A SequenceInterval represents a span on a Sequence. Positions are always represented by contiguous spans using interbase coordinates or coordinate ranges. The minimum value of this coordinate or range is 0. MUST represent a coordinate or range greater than the value of start . . docs.text: Class: VariationDescriptor This descriptor class is used for describing VRS Variation value objects. URI: GA4GHValueObjectDescriptorDefinitions:VariationDescriptor Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info id CURIE 1..1 Descriptor ID; MUST be unique within document. . vrs_type TypeOptions 1..1 MUST be "VariationDescriptor". . label NONE 0..1 A primary label for the value object. . description NONE 0..1 A free-text description of the value object. . xrefs CURIE 0..* None . alternate_labels NONE 0..* None . extensions Extension 0..* None . variation_id CURIE 0..1 This SHOULD be provided if variation is omitted. . variation Variation 1..1 This SHOULD be provided if variation_id is omitted. . molecule_context MoleculeContextOptions 0..1 The molecular context of this variant. Must be one of "genomic", "transcript", or "protein". . structural_type CURIE 0..1 The structural variant type associated with this variant. We RECOMMEND a descendent term of SO:0001537 . . expressions Expression 1..* Typically HGVS or ISCN nomenclature expressions. Other systems relevant to the description of variation MAY be used. . vcf_record VcfRecord 0..1 A VCF Record of the variant. This SHOULD be a single allele, the VCF genotype (GT) field should be represented in the allelic_state attribute. . gene_context NONE 0..1 A specific gene context that applies to this variant. . vrs_ref_allele_seq Sequence 0..1 A VRS Sequence corresponding to a "ref allele", describing the sequence expected at a VRS SequenceLocation reference. . allelic_state CURIE 0..1 We RECOMMEND that the allelic_state of a variation be described by terms from the Genotype Ontology (GENO). These SHOULD descend from concept GENO:0000875 <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GENO_0000875> . . docs.text: name: VariationDescriptor description: This descriptor class is used for describing VRS Variation value objects. from_schema: https://example.org/GA4GHValueObjectDescriptorDefinitions slot_usage: id: name: id description: Descriptor ID; MUST be unique within document. range: CURIE required: true vrs_type: name: vrs_type description: MUST be "VariationDescriptor". range: type_options required: true label: name: label description: A primary label for the value object. description: name: description description: A free-text description of the value object. xrefs: name: xrefs multivalued: true range: CURIE alternate_labels: name: alternate_labels multivalued: true extensions: name: extensions multivalued: true range: Extension variation_id: name: variation_id description: This SHOULD be provided if *variation* is omitted. range: CURIE variation: name: variation description: This SHOULD be provided if *variation_id* is omitted. range: Variation molecule_context: name: molecule_context description: The molecular context of this variant. Must be one of "genomic", "transcript", or "protein". range: molecule_context_options structural_type: name: structural_type description: The structural variant type associated with this variant. We RECOMMEND a descendent term of [SO:0001537](http://www.sequenceontology.org/browser/current_release/term/SO:0001537). range: CURIE expressions: name: expressions description: Typically HGVS or ISCN nomenclature expressions. Other systems relevant to the description of variation MAY be used. range: Expression vcf_record: name: vcf_record description: A VCF Record of the variant. This SHOULD be a single allele, the VCF genotype (GT) field should be represented in the *allelic_state* attribute. range: VcfRecord gene_context: name: gene_context description: A specific gene context that applies to this variant. vrs_ref_allele_seq: name: vrs_ref_allele_seq description: A `VRS Sequence`_ corresponding to a "ref allele", describing the sequence expected at a `VRS SequenceLocation`_ reference. range: Sequence allelic_state: name: allelic_state description: We RECOMMEND that the *allelic_state* of a variation be described by terms from the Genotype Ontology (GENO). docs.text: Class: VcfRecord This data class is used when it is desirable to pass data as expected from a VCF record. The class is only used as an optional attribute within a VariationDescriptor. The Genotype field from a VCF should be captured by the allelic_state attribute in the Variation Descriptor. URI: GA4GHValueObjectDescriptorDefinitions:VcfRecord Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info genome_assembly NONE 1..1 Identifier for the genome assembly used to call the allele. . chrom NONE 1..1 A chromosome or contig identifier. . pos NONE 1..1 The reference residue-coordinate position, with the first residue having position 1. . id NONE 0..1 A semicolon-separated list of unique identifiers where available. For example, dbSNP rsIDs. We RECOMMEND storing this information as a list in the VariationDescriptor xrefs field. . ref NONE 1..1 Reference base as expected by the VCF specification. . alt NONE 1..1 Alternate base as expected by the VCF specification. . qual NONE 0..1 Quality: Phred-scaled quality score for the assertion made in ALT. . filter NONE 0..1 Filter status: PASS if this position has passed all filters. . info NONE 0..1 Additional information: Semicolon-separated series of additional information fields. .
